message.body: I woke up today w seven new bites down my side just FYI- not sure how long it takes for them to die but I did put all my stuff on high heat and did everything I had to in my room. All my stuff is in trash bags
And has been since the exterminator came
Ok Cindy's going to come Friday at ten. She said I shouldn't be getting bitten
Friday is the earliest she can get there?? Beth thought she might be able to stop by today......
OK. Gotcha. From what I understand sooner is better then later.
Well I wouldn't have been there bc I work all day and I wanted to be there
I mean she already sprayed n powdered twice not sure what diff is if she comes today or Friday ? Dunno
Actually not sure what point is at all which is why I wanted to be there
Hmm ok yeah . I mean some stuff I couldn't bag bc I have to Wear it
Or sleep on/under it
I wanted to ask about carpet maybe and other roomies doing their rooms
Bc I'm still confused how...she didn't see bugs or traces of bugs in my room either . Just bc she doesn't see them in theirs, doesn't mean they're not there ?
I'm willing to even trash bag my furniture?
Eh ya I mean she can go in now if she wants but i won't be home all night
I'm not sure but obviously something is in there. I'm assuming its bed bugs. She didn't see anything last time?
Have you talked to David?
It's def bedbugs. The bites I'm getting this time are perfectly in a row
First a row up my legs
Now a row up my sides
￼Hate to send a bit of side pube buuuut hahaha here ya go!! A bit of nudity doesn't hurt anyone especially since this is the least sexy thing ever
But I have these on Both sides
On both legs
And across my lower back
It's def bedbugs no doubt
Before I had random all over bites but now every night it's like a New row lol

Shit. I'm sorry. I think part of the problem is we didn't jump on the problem early enough. Then when she came the first time she should have had you bag & wash everything. Since you have done all of that this time; I'm hoping one more treatment should kill off the remainder.
Did Cindy see any evidence of bed bugs last time she was there?
Nope she hasn't seen any at any point
Which is why I don't see why her not seeing any in the roommates' rooms means anything

Yeah. I'm just not sure but I know when David & Phillip had them in their rooms they def noticed them. I know some people aren't bothered by the bites but I'm guessing its a small minority of the population. Have you been to bedbugs.org?
Please call/ text David when you get a chance. I sent him a text earlier.
Haha ￼That is Exactly what my back looks like. Both lines up and down and also a row horizontally across above my butt
K and I guess I'll sleep at my dads for awhile again
At least for my current bites to heal

Ok. David just sent me this in response to my question - - - No, but I was feeling bruise and itchy last night on my back and stomach. I'll check it out tonight and tomorrow if these bastard are still alive
Yeah I mean we def have them
All my bites on side are from these past two days
￼Arm too :( :(
It's pretty awful and I can't really go home bc my dad lives in burbs and I dog walk w a bike that I can't take on train and I open coffeeshop at 6am which is too early to get to from suburbs
So I need to sleep there tonight but I know I'll get a bunch of bites
I'm going to figure out plan to stay at my dads for a bit and I'll let you know when I'm out of the house
But basically if it doesn't get fixed I'll have to move out :( bc i really need a place in the city to stay for my jobs to work out
And I broke up w my bf a few days ago and can't sleep there haha

I don't really have friends in the city to stay w bc all my best friends live in other cities so Eventually I'll have to find a place in city that I can sleep in while the problem gets fixed :( aka I'll have to move
I can't live at my dads and make my jobs work out
(Or I would just do that while this got sorted out)
OK. I understand. Lets try to get Beth in there ASAP & we will go from there. Either way I HAVE to get this taken care of.
Is there anyway you could meet her tomorrow?
I could but she can't do tomorrow
I'm meeting her Friday ten am and then I'll call you
Cool. I'm thinking that this should be it. Lets keep our fingers crossed!!
I asked David to call / text you.
Do you have David's number or see him often?
No
I looked at that website though and it looks like they could be hiding in my furniture etc
And my furniture is prob ruined since id have to pack it up in bags for a year
Also that the carpet needs to be heat treated/shampoo
No where on that website does it say the perimeters of the room just need dusting and the fabric just needs to be packed up
It says that you have to get Everything and that they'll hide and then come back out
Also clearly I'm allergic to the bite etc
Bc mine do look like large welts
So maybe someone else will move in and be fine bc they won't Notice it
But I feel like I'm going to continually be the canary in then coal mine so to speak
And then they'll run into another room while I'm gone, then a week after I move all my stuff back in, they'll bite me again
And that will have ad infinitum
*happen

I'm not sure. But if you have questions you can call Beth. Between Beth & the website, I'd trust Beth. She has been with bedbugs successfully for years. You might be more allergic then most but either way I Have to get rid of these.
Not sure why talking to David would help
Also not sure how meeting w exterminator for 3rd time would help
It all started in David's room. He was the one who first reported the issue back in April or May. Before you moved in We thought they were gone.

This problem hasn't been attacked correctly until the last week. It wasn't being addressed at all for the first 3 or 4 weeks you lived there. Then when Cindy came out initially she probably Should have had you bag & wash everything. In retrospect I have no idea why she didn't esp considering the fact that we just had them.
I truly believe if it was Beth treating this instead of Cindy we wouldn't even be having the conversation because the bed bugs would be have been long gone.
:/ yeah that makes sense
She told me we didn't even have them
So all my roommates acted like I was paranoid
I'm not paranoid lol My whole body is covered in bites
I Really Really wish Beth was around!! I'll call her in a little bit.
Of course not. I'm kind of shocked that anyone would think you are paranoid. Everyone knew about the bed bugs. I sent out many many text messages to everyone about this over the past few months.
Well since they aren't getting bitten, they are in denial

I am fairly certain we can get rid of these lil fuckers with in a week. But if they aren't gone in a week - if you want to move, I totally understand. Pls just give me a few more days to get rid of them.
Clearly, bc they keep having people stay over too
Which is awkward bc I'm like cleaning all my stuff in drier for third time and their bf gf whatever is like ooooh whatcha doin
Hahahahahahaha
'Oooh nothing I'm just really clean um..'
Geez. Who is acting like that?
Nah not acting Mean
I just think that the house isn't convinced we have them
Or thinks , as you seem to hope, that they are just in my room
But she didn't see any signs of them in my room either
I'd really like to keep you as a roommate. I have to get rid of the problem regardless of whether you stay or not.
So I see no reason why they wouldn't very likely be all over the place
I'm willing to give it another week :)

I just don't know but I sent them all multiple texts about it like this -- Have you noticed any bed bugs or any bug bites? Ingrid thinks she may have them. I'm waiting on a call back from the exterminator.
I just highly doubt it'll be solved
Right they know I Think I Might have them
And they know th exterminator keeps coming and saying she doesn't see anything hahaha
So they think I'm getting them some where else but I am NoT
OK. Thank you. I really appreciate it. This is a solvable problem. People get bed bugs & get rid of them all the time. N
I have only been sleeping there and I go to bed and then wake up w many new bites every night
Yeah it's solvable but not if I'm only doing my room
I'm not trying to be a bitch I just truly don't understand how me once again drying everything will help. My stuff is Already in bags
The know things I don't have in bags are the clothes I dryed but need to wear for the week
But the bugs could be in my Furniture, my carpet
I'm not sure but I'll check with Beth. The do tend to migrate from room to room & house to house but not always.
The Other roommates furniture and clothes
The downstairs carpet and furniture
(Bc I swear I slept there once and was bitten a ton there too
*only things
K I'll meet with her again tomorrow and redry the stuff I have out for me to wear
Also my bed in in Center of room now
And I lifted bed off floor w metal frame
I don't know that you do need to dry everything again. Did Cindy tell you to do that?
And have been sleeping on the vinyl with only one blanket that I dry every night and Don't let touch floor
I think having the mattress off the floor helps.
Yes she said that
But according to everything I've read, what I'm doing isn't remotely enough
And powdering won't be enough either
You have to deal with All furniture and all carpets and everything At Once
After I call Beth I'm going to have her call you. What is the best time for you to talk today?
I can talk any time
The first time we had them was years ago when this girl went to AC to take the NJ bar exam & brought them back. We treated her room & that was it.
Hmm
We didn't have to treat the rest of the house because they didn't spread there.
Ok yeah I dunno
Maybe you got lucky and killed them all in one go
Yeah I dunno I see what you're saying and Maybe me doing my room again Will kill them all but you can see why it's frustrating and feels futile to me
From what Beth told me there are patterns but no set rules to bed bugs. Sometimes they spread like wildfire but sometimes they don't.
Bc it might or it might not and that's annoying when I'm the only one doing the effort
Like it seems more rational to bE Safe and have More people do it so that I know I'm not doing the effort Again for nothing
I totally understand. I mean as much as someone who isn't getting bitten every night can understand. And I sincerely appreciate your patience up to this point.
Also I see no reason why I'd do my stuff again when I have a carpet that they could have laid eggs in
Or just be living in
Maybe there are tons of them under my carpet who knows
This idea that- oh well Ingrid will do all her clothes and sheets again and live out of trash bags for another two weeks Just To See
K I will meet w her tomorrow and put all my stuff in bags and prob stay at my dads somehow
All these questions are things that Beth will know the answer to. Please have a list of questions when she calls & she can explain the answers in detail.
K

Either was if they aren't gone in a week, I'll cancel your lease & give you back your money so you can find a place that is free of bed bugs. I can't ask you for anything else. You have been more then patient through this ordeal.
Thank you :)
Thank you & I am so sorry that you are dealing with it.
